title: MISSION REINDEER PORO

embed.description: This video is about MISSION REINDEER PORO

body:
So basically, I accidentally went down the naughty missions and got the baron poro icon cuz I didnt read the patch notes. SO I REMEMBERED THE THING ABOUT SENDING IN ART FOR RP! However, I knew just a picture would not get me an icon. SO PLEASE, FELLOW LEAGUE PLAYERS, HELP ME ACCOMPLISH MISSION REINDEER PORO.

RIOTERS, PLS, CAN I HAVE RENDEER PORO ICON?

replies.body:
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH THIS WAS SO LEGIT!!!!!

Looks like today you're a pretty LUCKY salad, cus this is something we've seen a few players have issues with. It really sucks that you accidentally completed on of the missions lines without realizing, and even more shitty that it prevents you from getting that sweet reindeer poro. 

I've gone ahead and reset those missions for you, so make sure you refresh your client to see it take effect and complete the mission you want this time ^_^!

PS Be sure to let me know in a reply if this didn't work correctly for some reason!!

DEAR BEAUTIFUL AND DIVINE Broporo,

I TOO have fallen to the clutches of the accidental BARON PORO.. MAY I ALSO have a chance to restart.. my missions oh GREAT Broporo, pls i CRY.. I've been playing aram for a whole 5 hours because i thought it was another ARAM mission (pls save me i h8 ARAM SO MUCH) but I HAVE BEEN DECEIVED!!!! PLEASE SIR Broporo, if you could find it in your heart to give me a clean mission slate.. so I can achieve my own DREAMS of the reindeer poro... I will FOREVER boast about your KINDNESS!!!!

WITH HOPE & LOVE,
FLUFFY LULU

P.S
FORGIVE MY TYPING STYLE, I AM JUST FULL OF DISGUST AND DISTRAUGHT FROM THE WRATH OF THE BARON PORO ICON. ILY PLS SAVE ME

> [{quoted}](name=FLUFFY LULU,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=12kRmLwa,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2017-12-16T22:08:52.531+0000)

Dear Broporo,
I can say with absolute certainty that my good friend, Fluffy Lulu here, is not a hoe. Therefore giving her the absolute right to her fabled and ever so deserving reindeer poro.

Sincerely,
Her friend who got the poro and feels bad cuz aram literally physically hurts to play
What a great friend! Lordt knows I need more good friends who are willing to point out that I am not, in fact, a hoe - and that I DO deserve good, cute, fluffy things ^_^

Sorry for the slow reply, dis poro was on his weekend xP!

Oh gosh no, we certainly didn't mean for those missions to be deceiving xD! I'd hate for anyone to miss getting the poro of their choice, they're both so cute I could barely decide!!! You should be g2g now, but make sure to be careful when completely the mission this time ^_^

https://i.imgur.com/r9ABG8e.gif
I LOVE BROPORO!!!!!!!!!!! BEST RIOTER NA {{champion:117}}
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I also accidentally completed the Naughty mission while trying to finish the Zoe missions. I forgot they existed. ; _ ; Is it possible for me to get a reset too?
We gotchu fam ^_^

So sorry to bother you again, but I got the reset for the first mission, but since I already had a naughty mission it autmatically put me on the naughty track again. Not sure if there's anything that can be done about that..

T_T im trying so hard to be good.
Ohmigosh, so dis poro made a slight mistake. Check it again for me real quick fam!!
It's fixed! You're definitely the best poro :D Thanks again!
Thank you so so much!
THANK YOU SO MUCHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

We help where we can ^_^

Dear rito
I haf been a good boi
I have taken the naughty mission by mistake
May i rezeeve this reindeer poro icon
Ily
I got mixed up as well :(. Is it possible to get the undo and have the quest back to be nice? :(  i LOVE THE REINDEER PORO :( BROPORO PLEASE HELP! :(
I have no art and no beautiful writing to give. However, I do my part in attempting to give good bug reports when I find them. I ask this in the name of BROPORO. Aporo.
Mehh... I think it is your fault but if you can get RP for art then that should be okay. It is funny and I approve. {{item:3695}}
HAH baron boy get rekt

jk help this man he is a good player

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}{{champion:64}}
Wow. This guy{{item:2052}}  is committed lol. Great vid. Rito pls help this man (or woman).
